title: What trade routes did Christopher Columbus follow? - Quora

response.answer_text: Think about it for a second and you’ll realize that Columbus couldn’t have followed any trade routes because there wasn’t any trans-Atlantic trade when he set out on his first voyage. At most, and for a very short first step, he would have known how to get to the Canary Islands. Anything past that was a leap into the unknown. Say what you like about the man but he was an excellent sailor. His times for crossing the Atlantic weren’t bettered for many years.
